name: Super Mario Legacy
overview: Super Mario Legacy is a traditionally styled platform game inspired primarily by Super Mario Bros. 3 and Yoshi's Island, and is the result of many years of development. Features 75 challenging stages, colourful graphics, and a ton of ASM enhancements, including a game difficulty option, multiple midway points, hundreds of custom blocks and sprites, and utilization of the SA-1 chip to power features that would otherwise be impossible.
